message: Take it or leave it, Bob.  I'm feeling generous.
Let's be fair, 40% for me is a good starting point
I'm feeling more generous this time.  You should take this, Bob. The next round, you'll be getting even less.
Come on, Alice, meet me halfway. 45% is a good compromise.
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it.
Last chance, Alice. 50/50 is the fairest split. If you reject, I'll assume you're not interested in a deal.
